mapper.sql: ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TITLE, TYPE, NUMBER, COLOR, CHARACTER_ID, ACTION, STAT_TYPE, GIFT, PARENT, `GROUP`, BACK_UP, IS_DELETED
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_ITEM where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or TITLE like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ACHIEVEMENT (ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TITLE, TYPE, NUMBER, COLOR, CHARACTER_ID, ACTION, STAT_TYPE, GIFT, PARENT, `GROUP`, BACK_UP, IS_DELETED) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR})

replace into SYS_ACHIEVEMENT (ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TITLE, TYPE, NUMBER, COLOR, CHARACTER_ID, ACTION, STAT_TYPE, GIFT, PARENT, `GROUP`, BACK_UP, IS_DELETED) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.gift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.group,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR})

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into SYS_ACHIEVEMENT
ID,
NAME,
DESCRIPTION,
TITLE,
TYPE,
NUMBER,
COLOR,
CHARACTER_ID,
ACTION,
STAT_TYPE,
GIFT,
PARENT,
`GROUP`,
BACK_UP,
IS_DELETED,

mapper.update:
update SYS_ACHIEVEMENT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STAT_TYPE = #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GIFT = #{gift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`GROUP` = #{group,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BACK_UP = #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_ACHIEVEMENT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STAT_TYPE = #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GIFT = #{gift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `GROUP` = #{group,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BACK_UP = #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
